mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Estate of Hugh Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The list of items on this receipt is quite varied -- cups and saucers, candlesticks, buckets, shovel, axe, hatchet, powder, sieve, knives, forks, and spoons, tea and coffee. Although the list is not on letterhead, Baltimore is listed as the location. The total is $57.08.
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Invoice from Ward Bros. for Reuben, April 19, 1860
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Legacies
Slavery
